scripts.install-and-build-all: npm install --prefix ./common && npm run build --prefix common && npm install --prefix ./git-upstream-set-check-pr-block && npm run build --prefix ./git-upstream-set-check-pr-block && npm install --prefix ./git-upstream-set-create-pr && npm run build --prefix ./git-upstream-set-create-pr && npm install --prefix ./github-flow-check-branch-name && npm run build --prefix ./github-flow-check-branch-name && npm install --prefix ./github-flow-check-commit-message && npm run build --prefix ./github-flow-check-commit-message && npm install --prefix ./github-flow-update-pr-title && npm run build --prefix ./github-flow-update-pr-title && npm install --prefix ./github-flow-update-release-notes && npm run build --prefix ./github-flow-update-release-notes  && npm install --prefix ./github-flow-sync-with-mirror && npm run build --prefix ./github-flow-sync-with-mirror && npm install --prefix ./github-flow-mirror-repo && npm run build --prefix ./github-flow-mirror-repo && npm install --prefix ./github-set-actions-permissions && npm run build --prefix ./github-set-actions-permissions && npm install --prefix ./github-update-gitmodules && npm run build --prefix ./github-update-gitmodules
